entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @markknoller @PressSec Please make the case that second hand smoke in public was deemed dangerous to the health of others and an infringement on the rights of non-smokers & smoking was banned in public.#COVID19 is far more dangerous; I would rather sit next to a smoker than someone without a mask.
